channel.title: CVE Feed for Salon Booking System -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Salon Booking System -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-24429|2024-08-03T19:28:23.972Z -- salon%20booking%20system -- salon%20booking%20system
item.description: The Salon booking system WordPress plugin before 6.3.1 does not properly sanitise and escape the First Name field when booking an appointment, allowing low privilege users such as subscriber to set JavaScript in them, leading to a Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. The Payload will then be triggered when an admin visits the "Calendar" page and the malicious script is executed in the admin context.

item.title: CVE-2022-43487|2024-08-03T13:32:59.593Z -- salon%20booking%20system -- salon%20booking%20system
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Salon booking system versions prior to 7.9 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.

item.title: CVE-2023-48319|2024-08-02T21:23:39.467Z -- salon%20booking%20system -- salon%20booking%20system
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in Salon Booking System Salon booking system allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Salon booking system: from n/a through 8.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-30510|2024-08-02T01:38:59.906Z -- salon%20booking%20system -- salon%20booking%20system
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in Salon Booking System Salon booking system.This issue affects Salon booking system: from n/a through 9.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-37231|2024-06-24T12:39:16.964Z -- salon%20booking%20system -- salon%20booking%20system
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Salon Booking System Salon booking system allows File Manipulation.This issue affects Salon booking system: from n/a through 9.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-30510|2024-03-29T13:36:22.950Z -- salon%20booking%20system -- salon%20booking%20system
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in Salon Booking System Salon booking system.This issue affects Salon booking system: from n/a through 9.5.
